balanceOf(address).details: Function to access the balance of a specific address.

params._owner: address the target address to get the balance from.

balanceOf(address).return: _balance uint256 the balance of the target address.

decimals().details: Function to access decimals of token.
decimals().return: _decimals uint8 decimal point of token fractions.

name().details: Function to access name of token.
name().return: _name string the name of the token.

symbol().details: Function to access symbol of token.
symbol().return: _symbol string the symbol of the token.

totalSupply().details: Function to access total supply of tokens.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Standard function transfer similar to ERC20 transfer with no _data. Added due to backwards compatibility reasons.

params._to: address to which the tokens are transfered.
params._value: uint256 amount of tokens to be transfered.

transfer(address,uint256,bytes).details: Function that is called when a user or another contract wants to transfer funds using default fallback.

params._to: address to which the tokens are transfered.
params._value: uint256 amount of tokens to be transfered.

transfer(address,uint256,bytes,string).details: Function that is called when a user or another contract wants to transfer funds using custom fallback.

params._fallback: string name of the custom fallback function to be called after transaction.
params._to: address to which the tokens are transfered.
params._value: uint256 amount of tokens to be transfered.

tokenFallback(address,uint256,bytes).details: Standard ERC223 function that will handle incoming token transfers.

devdoc.title: Contract that will work with ERC223 tokens.
